name: Rural Woman's Development Trust (RWDT)
briefDescription: RURAL WOMANâ€™S DEVELOPMENT TRUST (RWDT) is a registered social service organization working since 2005 as a public charity trust and registered under Indian Trust Act 1882 and tax exemption under Income Tax of India 1961 and FCRA ACT 2010. The founders are women from the target group of villages. The Managing Trustee is a post-graduate woman who has dedicated her life for the cause of women development in the rural area. This is a women organization. Apart from women development, the organization has also been undertaking programs and activities for the over all development of people living under-the-poverty line irrespective of caste, creed and religion.STAFFS : full time 4, part time 3 and volunteers 15
